page.title: 04Education
page.content: In{Montrose}there are 6 primary schools-Borrowfield,Lochside,Southesk, St Margaret's(Roman Catholic),Dun and Ferryden.Borrowfield is an open-plan school.Formerly there was a 7th primary school,North Links, but this was closed due to disrepair. {Montrose Academy,}the only secondary school in the area,is a six year comprehensive,opened in 1962.{The} {Academy}is an impressive buiding with it's gold dome but suffers from a lack of classrooms and the fact the playing fields are some distance from the school. {The Academy}has one of the finest collections of books in the country boasting no less than 3 Incunabula. In 1985 a new rector Mr.W.H.Faulkener was appointed. There are also fee-paying schools in the area.
